artist: Artist: José Guadalupe Posada; Publisher: La Estampa Mexicana, Mexico; Printer: Taller de Grafica Popular, Mexico City
creditline: Gift of Lisa and David Erickson
description: three men wearing hats and coats at left, speaking with an old woman who holds her hand up to the face of the centermost man; man wearing a sombrero behind woman; text at top and bottom: "GALERIA DEL / TEATRO INFATIL / COLECCION / DE COMEDIAS / PARA / NINOS O TITRES / LOS GENDARMES / EDITOR / A. VANECAS ARROYO / MEXICO"
portfolio: From 25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada
provenance: Lisa and David Erickson, Minneapolis; given to Mia, 2017
title: Los Gendarmes (The Police), plate 6 from "25 Prints of Jose Guadalupe Posada"
